locations: de, germany, north rhine-westphalia, bad salzuflen, 32105, bahnhofstraße, 33, 52.08077965, 8.744008803230237
short_description: polster max is a furniture store based in bad salzuflen, germany.
long_description: wohnen sie einfach schöner mit der besonderen polster-max-kollektion und der besonderen polster max beratung. dabei bieten wir viele tausend stoff- und lederkombinationen an. erleben sie, wie das polster max-team ihren ganz persönlichen wohntraum zu bezahlbaren preisen realisiert.
generated_description: polster max, legally known as polster max gmbh, based in bad salzuflen, north rhine-westphalia, is a specialized company in the upholstery industry. established for 37 years, the company offers a wide range of upholstered furniture, including both affordable and exclusive models. polster max provides a variety of fabric and leather combinations, along with a selection of system furniture. the company emphasizes comfort, design, and durability in its products. polster max also offers free disposal of old furniture and delivery services without additional costs. the company prides itself on its long-standing experience and partnerships with renowned manufacturers.
generated_business_tags: furniture disposal | upholstered furniture retailer | home decor retailer | leather combinations | upholstery specialist | system furniture options

locations: de, germany, north rhine-westphalia, bad salzuflen, , , , 52.0771518, 8.7554739
short_description: polster max is a furniture repair & reconditioning services company based in bad salzuflen, germany.
long_description: aus kleinsten anfängen entwickelte sich die firma langsam aber stetig zu einem leistungsstarken polstermöbelspezialisten, der nunmehr weit über die grenzen der region bekannt ist. neben dem inhaber-ehepaar udo und jutta stockhausen sind sohn matthias als geschäftsführer und tochter christiane als einrichtungs-beraterin im unternehmen tätig. weitere unterstützung finden die geschäftsinhaber durch engagierte mitarbeiter, die größtenteils schon mehrere jahre im unternehmen tätig sind.
generated_description: the company is a well-known upholstery furniture specialist that has grown from modest beginnings to become a prominent player in the region. the company is owned by udo and jutta stockhausen, with udo's son matthias as the managing director and his daughter christiane as an interior design consultant. the business is supported by dedicated employees, many of whom have been with the company for several years.
generated_business_tags: upholstered furniture specialist | furniture restoration services | consultancy services | fast, reliable, high-quality upholstery services
